<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<body>

<script>
function add() {
  google.calendar.addCalendar("en.usa#holiday@group.v.calendar.google.com",
      "US Holidays");
}
</script>

<script>
function getNextEvents(){
    console.log('get new events');
}
function getPrefsCallback(prefs){
  google.calendar.subscribeToDataChange(getNextEvents);
}
google.calendar.getPreferences(getPrefsCallback);
</script>
<center>
    google.calendar.subscribeToDataChange(
 
</center>

</body>
</html>
